long_description: Burton Tyro snowboard boots offer out-of-the-box comfort so you're feeling good on the slopes from day one. Shrinkage(TM) footprint reduction technology reduces the boots overall length by 1 size helping to eliminate toe drag. Streamlined Speed Dial lacing system lets you twist your laces tight; laces are constantly fully engaged when tightening or loosening. Exit is easy with a quick pull of the dial-top loop. Imprint 1 EVA liners with guick-fit harnesses and lace locks secure feet; lightweight power panels surround calves and ankles with supportive comfort. Soft-flexing, slim 3D molded tongues wrap the forefeet in comfort, offer a seamless flex and reduce performance-robbing shell/liner stack-up. Flexible backstay spines increase medial/lateral support, edge-to-edge response and durability. Snow-proof internal gussets on boot tongues completely seal lower boot zones to keep feet warm and dry. EVA footbeds cushion every step. Low-profile EST(TM) midsoles/outsoles with a reduced ramp angle lower your center of gravity for improved feel; ultra-damping B3 gel inserts cushion without added weight.
short_description: Burton Tyro snowboard boots offer out-of-the-box comfort so you're feeling good on the slopes from day one.
